settings.name: Meeting Distance Threshold
settings.description: Distance threshold in meters for considering two animals to be close to each other

settings.name: Time Unit for Resampling
settings.description: Time unit for resampling trajectory data. Available values: 'min' (minutes), 'h' (hours), 'D' (days). Use pandas datetime frequency strings.

settings.name: Group ID Column
settings.description: Name of the column to use for coloring nodes by group (e.g., 'group_id', 'species', 'sex'). Set to empty string to disable grouping.

settings.name: Edge Threshold Percentile
settings.description: Percentile threshold for filtering weak edges (0-100). Higher values result in fewer edges shown in the graph.

settings.name: Node Spacing
settings.description: Spacing between nodes in layout. Higher values result in more spread out nodes.

settings.name: Minimum Edge Width
settings.description: Minimum width for edges in visualization

settings.name: Maximum Edge Width
settings.description: Maximum width for edges in visualization

settings.name: Node Size
settings.description: Size of nodes in the graph

settings.name: Figure Width
settings.description: Width of the output figure in inches

settings.name: Figure Height
settings.description: Height of the output figure in inches

settings.name: Show Edge Labels
settings.description: Whether to show edge weight labels on the graph

settings.name: Edge Label Threshold Percentile
settings.description: Only show labels for edges above this percentile (if show-edge-labels is true)

settings.name: Label Strategy
settings.description: Strategy for handling node labels: 'offset' (offset labels from nodes with lines), 'minimal' (only show labels for peripheral nodes), 'none' (don't show labels)

settings.name: Filter by Year
settings.description: Year to filter the trajectory data (optional filtering step)
